targets.expr: sum(irate(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", pod_name=~"daci-wfm-forecast-.*", namespace="daci-wfm-forecast-ns", response_code!~"5.*", response_code!~"4.*"}[5m])) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", pod_name=~"daci-wfm-forecast-.*", namespace="daci-wfm-forecast-ns"}[5m]))

alert.message:
Platform: WFM
Application: WFM Forecast
Endpoint: WFM Forecast
Priority: P1
Message: CPU usage exceeding the given request cores: please validate the service: and keep an eye
alert.name: P1-  WFM - Store Alignment - CPU usage Cores alert

alert.message:
Platform: WFM
Application: WFM Forecast
Endpoint: WFM Forecast
Priority: P1
Message: Memory usage exceeding the given request threshold: please validate the service: and keep an eye
alert.name: P1- WFM - WFM Admin - Memory Usage alert

panels.description:
This represents the total [CPU resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-cpu) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable CPU cores](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: Memory
